employees.notes: Proff lists 17 employees for the company profile; another company-published document states 32 employees in 2024, so comparability may depend on reporting basis.[1][2]

revenue.notes: Revenue is converted to NOK from Proff's 'Beløp i 1000' presentation (120 483 x 1,000).[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: Resolved to the Norwegian legal entity SV ASFALT AS (Aksjeselskap) with org number 917 192 278 on Proff official company information.[1]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Reviewed public disclosures describe asphalt services/roadworks activity, but do not explicitly document inbound secondary raw material use (recycled/recovered waste-derived inputs) by this legal entity.[1][2]
gaps_and_uncertainties: No reviewed source provides a quantified inbound raw-material/feedstock mix (e.g., recycled asphalt, slag, SRF, biogas) for SV ASFALT AS.[1][2]
No permit/EPD-style document was identified in the reviewed sources with explicit SRM input quantities attributable to SV ASFALT AS.[1][2]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn SV ASFALT AS Org nr 917 192 278
evidence.claim: Legal name and organization number for the entity.
Reported employee count on Proff profile.
Revenue figures are presented in thousands of NOK.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Legging av asfalt, steinarbeider og dertil tilhørende virksomhet.
evidence.claim: Company purpose focuses on asphalt laying/related works.

evidence.evidence_snippet: SV ASFALT AS er en leverandør av asfalttjenester innen vei og anleggsbransjen.
evidence.claim: Company describes itself as an asphalt services provider.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Vi leverer tjenester til både private, offentlige og profesjonelle aktører.
evidence.claim: Company disclosure emphasizes service delivery rather than disclosed material inputs.
Alternative employee figure reported in company transparency statement.

sources.title: Sv Asfalt AS - Org.nr. 917 192 278 - Løten - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
